scenario: Simulates natural human browsing with variable delays and organic path navigation (e.g., starting with homepage, exploring related categories, then returning to homepage after reading)

patterns.behavioral: natural pauses, no rapid clicks, mimics human decision-making delays

reasoning: Human behavior includes organic navigation patterns (e.g., returning to homepage after reading reviews), variable delays reflecting real-time thought processes, and non-linear path exploration (e.g., jumping between categories). The absence of scripted, rapid requests aligns with unpredictable human decision-making.
